com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial

Class DynamicSimpleTutorial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.DynamicSimpleTutorial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable

    public class DynamicSimpleTutorial
extends Object
implements Parcelable
    A simple tutorial item to display a title, subtitle and description along with an image which can be tinted according to the background color.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable
